properties.name: M2131_DataConnectorAddedChangedRemoved
properties.query:
AzureActivity
| where OperationNameValue contains "Microsoft.SecurityInsights/dataConnectors/"
| where ActivityStatusValue == "Succeeded"
| project OperationNameValue, Caller, CallerIpAddress, ActivityStatusValue, ActivitySubstatusValue, ResourceGroup, Properties, ResourceId, TimeGenerated
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
| extend Account = Caller
properties.description: 'This alert is designed to monitor data connector configurations. This alert is triggered when a data connector is added, updated, or deleted.'
